scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run copy:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy:client: rm -rf server/dist/client && mkdir -p server/dist && cp -r client/dist server/dist/client
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build
